trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> objects.
trans-unit.target: Contém uma coleção de <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objetos.

trans-unit.source: A ConnectionStringSettingsCollection object contains a collection of <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> objects.
trans-unit.target: Um objeto ConnectionStringSettingsCollection contém uma coleção de <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>objetos.</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>

trans-unit.source: Each <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings> object represents a single entry in the `<connectionStrings>` configuration-file section.
trans-unit.target: Cada <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>objeto representa uma única entrada no `<connectionStrings>` seção do arquivo de configuração.</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Adds a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto à coleção.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object to add to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto a ser adicionado à coleção.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Removes all the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> objects from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove todos os <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objetos da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Clear method removes all the connection strings from the configuration file at the current configuration hierarchy level and writes a `<clear>` tag in the file.
trans-unit.target: O método Clear remove todas as cadeias de caracteres de conexão do arquivo de configuração no nível da hierarquia de configuração atual e grava um `<clear>` marca no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The `<clear>` tag signifies that all the connection strings defined in the parent configuration files are disregarded by the system.
trans-unit.target: O `<clear>` marca significa que todas as cadeias de conexão definidas nos arquivos de configuração pai são ignoradas pelo sistema.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Returns the collection index of the passed <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Retorna o índice de coleção de transmitido <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The collection index of the specified <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: O índice da coleção especificada <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the connection string at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define a cadeia de caracteres de conexão no índice especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: No c#, essa propriedade é o indexador de <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: The index of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O índice de um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object with the specified name in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto com o nome especificado na coleção.

trans-unit.source: In C#, this property is the indexer for the <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection> class.
trans-unit.target: No c#, essa propriedade é o indexador de <xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>classe.</xref:System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettingsCollection>

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.
trans-unit.target: O nome de um <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto na coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object with the specified name; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto com o nome; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: A ser adicionado.

trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object in the collection.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"></xref> object at the specified index in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Configuration.ConnectionStringSettings"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado na coleção.
